etri.sdn.controller

Class OFController.QP

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • etri.sdn.controller.OFController.QP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    OFController

    private class OFController.QP
extends java.lang.Thread
    Queue Item Processor, which is a thread that pulls QI object from the queue that is associated with the thread. Each QP thread has one queue to receive QI object. Through the experiment, we have found out that TransferQueue is the most effective queueing mechanism for this thread.
    Author:
    bjlee

      • handleReadEvent

        public boolean handleReadEvent(Connection conn,
                      java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.OFMessage> msgs)
        This function delivers a read event to the QP thread.
        Parameters:
        conn - connection that the messages arrived
        msgs - messages read
        Returns:
        true of correctly handled, false otherwise.

      • process

        private boolean process(Connection conn,
              java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.OFMessage> msgs)
        process a list of OFMessage objects received from the connection.
        Parameters:
        conn - connection to switch
        msgs - messages received through the connection
        Returns:
        true if successfully processed. However, currently the return value of this function is not used by run().
